name: WritersBlock Global Game Jam
description:
Game Made for the 2014 Global Game Jam

You play a writer who has dozed off during work. In his dreams you must solve the riddle to wake up.

WASD Movement

Mouse Look

Mouse Click Throw Inkwell

When you are in the typewriter, any key to type and enter/return to submit your answer.

Answers to the riddles 

 Created by: Kendal Cormany (Programming) and Cameron Wrightsman (Art)
